channel.title: Workshops on Coding and Math Classes and Tutoring in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Coding and Math Classes and Tutoring in Charlottesville

item.title: Intro to AP Computer Science | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: 5 July – 9 August; 1:30 pm to 5:30 pm. An introduction to the Java programming language The workshop is recommended to students with prior coding experience. 12 July – 16 August; 1:30 pm to 5:30 pm. Basic Data Structure in Java The workshop is recommended to students who already know the basics of the Java language or complete the previous week workshop. Teacher: Nora. Payment is due on the first day of class.

item.title: Intro to Calculus | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: 29 July – 2 August; 1:30 pm to 5:30 pm. High-school students planing to take AP Calculus AB. Use the test linked here to decide if you are ready for the class. Each learning session consists of a short lesson followed by problem-solving. Teacher: Hillary Minimum enrollment: 5 students, Maxium 10 students. Payment is due on the first day of class. Sign up Daily Schedule Day Topics Monday Trig Functions, Logarithms, and Exponentials Tuesday Sets and Functions Wednesday Limits Thursday Continuity Friday Review

item.title: Intro to Counting and Probability Workshop | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: 5 – 9 August; 1:30 pm to 5:30 pm. Advanced middle-school students. Use the test linked here to decide if you are ready for the class. Use the test linked here to decide if you already know the content. Each learning session consists of a short lesson followed by problem-solving. Teacher: Hillary Minimum enrollment: 5 students, Maxium 10 students. Payment is due on the first day of class. Sign up
